flavorText:
"Not all nightmares can be escaped by waking."
—Ashiok

foreignData.flavorText: „Nicht allen Albträumen entkommt man durch Erwachen."—Ashiok
foreignData.name: Quälende Gedanken
foreignData.text: Opfere eine Kreatur als zusätzliche Kosten, um die Quälenden Gedanken zu wirken.Ein Spieler deiner Wahl wirft so viele Karten ab, wie die Stärke der geopferten Kreatur beträgt.

foreignData.flavorText: "Hay pesadillas de las que no se puede escapar despertando".—Ashiok
foreignData.name: Pensamientos atormentados
foreignData.text: Como coste adicional para lanzar los Pensamientos atormentados, sacrifica una criatura.El jugador objetivo descarta una cantidad de cartas igual a la fuerza de la criatura sacrificada.

foreignData.flavorText: « On ne peut pas échapper à tous les cauchemars en s'éveillant. »—Ashiok
foreignData.name: Pensées tourmentées
foreignData.text: En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer les Pensées tourmentées, sacrifiez une créature.Le joueur ciblé se défausse d'un nombre de cartes égal à la force de la créature sacrifiée.

foreignData.flavorText: "Non tutti gli incubi si possono scacciare al risveglio."—Ashiok
foreignData.name: Pensieri Strazianti
foreignData.text: Come costo addizionale per lanciare i Pensieri Strazianti, sacrifica una creatura.Un giocatore bersaglio scarta un numero di carte pari alla forza della creatura sacrificata.

foreignData.flavorText: 「目覚めても逃れられない悪夢もあるのだよ。」――アショク
foreignData.name: 苛まれし思考
foreignData.text: 苛まれし思考を唱えるための追加コストとして、クリーチャーを１体生け贄に捧げる。プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは生け贄に捧げたクリーチャーのパワーに等しい枚数のカードを捨てる。

foreignData.flavorText: '깨어나는 것으로 모든 악몽에서 탈출할 수 있는 건 아니다.'—아시오크
foreignData.name: 고통 받는 생각
foreignData.text: 고통 받는 생각을 발동하기 위한 추가비용으로, 생물 한 개를 희생한다.플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 희생된 생물의 공격력만큼의 카드를 버린다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Nem todos os pesadelos terminam ao acordar."— Ashiok
foreignData.name: Pensamentos Atormentados
foreignData.text: Como custo adicional para conjurar Pensamentos Atormentados, sacrifique uma criatura.O jogador alvo descarta um número de cards igual ao poder da criatura sacrificada.

foreignData.flavorText: «Не от всех кошмаров можно сбежать, проснувшись».— Ашиок
foreignData.name: Мучительные Мысли
foreignData.text: В качестве дополнительной стоимости разыгрывания Мучительных Мыслей пожертвуйте существо.Целевой игрок сбрасывает количество карт, равное силе пожертвованного существа.

foreignData.flavorText: 「并非所有梦魇都能靠醒转摆脱。」～安梭苛
foreignData.name: 受虐思绪
foreignData.text: 牺牲一个生物，以作为施放受虐思绪的额外费用。目标牌手弃若干牌，其数量等同于所牺牲生物的力量。

foreignData.flavorText: 「並非所有夢魘都能靠醒轉擺脫。」～安梭苛
foreignData.name: 受虐思緒
foreignData.text: 犧牲一個生物，以作為施放受虐思緒的額外費用。目標玩家棄若干牌，其數量等同於所犧牲之生物的力量。

name: Tormented Thoughts
originalText:
As an additional cost to cast Tormented Thoughts, sacrifice a creature.
Target player discards a number of cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power.

rulings.text: The targeted player will discard a number of cards equal to the power of the sacrificed creature as it last existed on the battlefield.
You must sacrifice exactly one creature to cast this spell; you cannot cast it without sacrificing a creature, and you cannot sacrifice additional creatures.
Players can only respond once this spell has been cast and all its costs have been paid. No one can try to destroy the creature you sacrificed to prevent you from casting this spell.
You must sacrifice exactly one creature to cast Tormented Thoughts. You can't cast it without sacrificing a creature, and you can't sacrifice additional creatures.
Players can only respond once this spell has been cast and all its costs have been paid. No one can try to destroy the creature you sacrifice to stop you from casting this spell.

text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Target player discards a number of cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power.
